summary: This document is an email summary of a call between attorneys Mariann Wang and Gloria Allred and an Assistant U.S. Attorney (AUSA) on March 1, 2021. The attorneys provide a proffer of additional information from their client, a victim, regarding subsequent interactions with Jeffrey Epstein beyond 2017, including travel, sexual abuse, and requests to find girls for him.

persons.name: Mariann Wang
persons.context: Attorney who, along with Gloria Allred, provided a proffer of additional information from their client to the AUSA regarding interactions with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Attorney who, along with Mariann Wang, provided a proffer of additional information from their client to the AUSA regarding interactions with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the investigation; described as luring the victim with job offers, arranging travel and dental appointments, requesting the victim find girls for him, and perpetrating sexual abuse.

connections.description: Co-counsel representing the same client and jointly providing a proffer to the AUSA.
Attorney for a victim providing information about Epstein's alleged criminal conduct to prosecutors.
Attorney for a victim providing information about Epstein's alleged criminal conduct to prosecutors.

events.title: Client Interview by SDNY & FBI
events.description: The attorneys' client was previously interviewed by the Southern District of New York (SDNY) and the FBI.

events.title: Subsequent Interactions Begin
events.description: The client had subsequent interactions with Jeffrey Epstein beginning in December 2018, contrary to prior statements that interactions ended in November 2017.

events.title: Subsequent Interactions End
events.description: The client's subsequent interactions with Jeffrey Epstein continued until July 2019.

events.title: Epstein's Arrest
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested; the timing coincided with dental appointments he arranged for the victim in New York.

keyFacts: A victim's attorneys disclosed that the victim had subsequent interactions with Jeffrey Epstein from December 2018 to July 2019, after previously stating interactions ended in November 2017.
Epstein allegedly lured the victim to Paris and Florida with offers of employment and later created a sense of obligation to agree to additional trips.
The victim alleges sexual abuse occurred during trips to Florida and the U.S. Virgin Islands.
Epstein asked the victim to find girls for him, including a specific request to meet with an 18/19-year-old girl for coffee in Russia.
Epstein arranged and paid for the victim's travel to New York for dental appointments around the time of his arrest in July 2019.
